subject: d4x 2.03 package
body:
Hello!
i have just found a small issue with the downloader 4 x update. the ftp search engines are missing something like:
%{_datadir}/d4x/ftpsearch.xml 
thanks in advance,
che
p.s. i love the xmms-xosd plugin :)
